verses.roman:
tabe dui ṛṣi āilā sei vyādha-sthāne
dūra haite vyādha pāila gurura daraśane

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; dui ṛṣi—two saintly persons; āilā—came; sei vyādha-sthāne—to the place of that hunter; dūra haite—from a distant place; vyādha—the hunter; pāila—got; gurura daraśane—vision of his spiritual master.
translation: "When the saintly sages came to the hunter's place, the hunter could see them coming from a distance.
